crossCitySources.name: Altmo Core API (Rails)
crossCitySources.description: Internal Rails 7 + PostgreSQL/PostGIS backend. Ingests GPS activity traces via Strava OAuth, validates against company geo-fences, aggregates leaderboards. 2.1M+ activities across 8 cities. ETL endpoints: /api/v1/activity_routes (routes with path arrays), /api/v1/leaderboards (company rankings), /api/v1/city_stats (city aggregations), /api/v1/companies + /api/v1/facilities (organisations). Additional endpoints available: /api/v1/routes/bulk, /api/v1/transit_activities, /api/v1/geo_markers, /api/v1/history.
crossCitySources.notes: Auth via access_token query param (RAILS_API_ACCESS_TOKEN). CO2 = distance(km) x 0.25 kg, Petrol = distance(km) x 0.108 L, Money = petrol x 101 INR

crossCitySources.name: Strava API (via Altmo Core)
crossCitySources.description: Primary activity data source. Users connect via OAuth, activities pulled automatically + via webhooks. Provides GPS polylines, distance, speed, elapsed time, activity type (Ride/Walk/Run). Direction detection (to/from work) via PostGIS proximity to company geo-markers (1km radius).

crossCitySources.name: Allirani & Verma (2025) — TQOLI Framework
crossCitySources.description: "A novel transportation Quality of Life Index framework for evaluating sustainable transport interventions", IISc Bangalore. Provides dimension weights (Fuzzy-AHP), scenario strategies (ST1/ST2), and intervention coefficients used in the ETQOLI scoring engine.

crossCitySources.name: OpenAQ v3 API
crossCitySources.description: Real-time PM2.5 measurements from CPCB-operated government monitoring stations. Sensor-based endpoint: /sensors/{id}/measurements. Stations discovered via location search within 25 km of each city center.

crossCitySources.name: CPCB National Ambient Air Quality Status
crossCitySources.description: Central Pollution Control Board annual PM2.5 averages from continuous ambient air quality monitoring stations. Baseline values for all cities.

crossCitySources.name: TomTom Traffic Flow API
crossCitySources.description: Real-time traffic flow data from 5-8 major arterial junctions per city. Congestion calculated as: ((freeFlowSpeed / currentSpeed) - 1) × 100. Sampled at representative road segments.

crossCitySources.name: TomTom Traffic Index (Annual)
crossCitySources.description: Annual city-level congestion rankings. Baseline congestion percentages for static QoL scoring.

crossCitySources.name: NCRB — Accidental Deaths & Suicides in India
crossCitySources.description: National Crime Records Bureau annual report. City-wise traffic accident fatalities normalised to per-lakh population rates.

crossCitySources.name: MoRTH — Road Accidents in India
crossCitySources.description: Ministry of Road Transport & Highways annual accident statistics. Used for cities not covered by NCRB city-level data (e.g. Indore).

crossCitySources.name: Census of India 2011
crossCitySources.description: Decennial census mode share data (walk, cycle, public transport, private vehicle) for urban areas. Used as baseline for cities without recent CMP/CTTS surveys.

crossCitySources.name: TransitRouter (Vonter)
crossCitySources.description: Open-source bus stops and services data for 9 Indian regions. Provides GTFS-like stop coordinates and route mappings. Data fetched from GitHub raw files.

crossCitySources.name: UrbanEmissions.info — APnA City Program
crossCitySources.description: City-level PM2.5 source apportionment using WRF-CAMx dispersion modelling (Guttikunda et al. 2019). Provides sector-wise emission shares: transport, industry, dust, waste burning, residential, DG sets.

crossCitySources.name: CEA CO2 Baseline Database v21.0
crossCitySources.description: Central Electricity Authority grid emission factors by region and state. National weighted average: 0.710 tCO2/MWh (FY 2024-25). Used for grid renewables baseline in scenario modelling.

crossCitySources.name: WHO Air Quality Guidelines 2021
crossCitySources.description: WHO global air quality guideline values. Annual PM2.5 guideline: 5 µg/m³, 24-hour: 15 µg/m³. Used as ETQOLI benchmark reference.

crossCitySources.name: India NAAQS (National Ambient Air Quality Standards)
crossCitySources.description: Indian national air quality standards. Annual PM2.5 standard: 40 µg/m³, 24-hour: 60 µg/m³. Reference for AQI category breakpoints.

sources.name: DULT Comprehensive Mobility Plan 2020

sources.name: OpenCity — Bengaluru CMP Dataset

sources.description: "Evaluating Climate Change Mitigation and Adaptation Strategies for Transport" — Bengaluru travel demand modelling for scenario validation.

sources.name: NCRB 2022 — Chennai

sources.name: RITES/DIMTS Transport Demand Forecast

sources.name: Delhi Metro Stations GeoJSON

sources.name: OpenAQ — Delhi Sensors

sources.name: UrbanEmissions — Delhi Source Apportionment
sources.description: Multiple studies synthesised: Transport 28-40% (exhaust + road dust), Power generation 3-8% (post-Badarpur closure 2018), Biomass 13-30%, Secondary PM 30-34%. Best central estimate: Transport 33%, Power 5%.

sources.name: RMI — Transforming Delhi's Power Grid
sources.description: Delhi grid: ~25-33% renewable (8-14% solar, 12-17% hydro), ~55-60% coal (from imports), ~8-11% gas. Delhi imports ~90% of power. Projects coal share declining to ~37% by 2030.

sources.name: NCRB 2022 — Delhi
sources.description: Traffic fatalities: 11.3 per lakh population (2022) — highest absolute numbers. Source: NCRB.

sources.name: Census/CMP — Hyderabad Mode Share
sources.description: Hyderabad mode share: Walking 20%, Cycling 5%, Public transport 31% (highest PT share among Altmo cities). Census 2011 + CMP data.

sources.name: HMRL Open Data
sources.description: Hyderabad Metro Rail Limited open data portal. HMR Line 1 + Line 2 + Line 3: 69.2 km operational (2024).

sources.name: Hyderabad Metro GeoJSON (kavyajeetbora)

sources.name: Telangana GTFS — HMRL

sources.name: TSRTC City Bus Services
